additionalRemarks._instruction: Enter additional remarks about the specimen (set) in this state.

biologicalSex._instruction: Add the biological sex of all specimen in this set.

internalIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier of this specimen set that is used within the corresponding data.

lookupLabel._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this specimen set (subject group or tissue sample collection) that may help you to more easily it find again.

phenotype._instruction: Add the phenotype of all specimen in this set.

quantity._instruction: Enter the number of specimen that belong to this set.

species._instruction: Add the species of all specimen in this set.

strain._instruction: Add the strain of all specimen in this set.
